raw_comment: This graph is excellent in explaining what parts of the country see their first leaves. This is a nice visual in explaining how being closer to the equator causes leaves to spring sooner. I do wonder, however, about the impacts that cause coastal and landlocked areas to have leaves sooner or later. For example, I see coastal areas sprouting leaves early even if they are not necessarily the most southern regions.
ace_sentences: This graph explains which parts of the country see their first leaves.
This visual explains that being closer to the equator causes leaves to spring sooner.
I wonder about the impacts that cause coastal areas to have leaves sooner or later.
I wonder about the impacts that cause landlocked areas to have leaves sooner or later.
I see that some coastal areas sprout leaves early.
Some coastal areas are not the most southern regions.
However, some coastal areas sprout leaves early.
